about.title: About Me
about.content: Welcome to my finance portfolio. I am a dedicated finance professional with a passion for leveraging technology to drive insightful financial analysis and strategic decision-making. My expertise spans quantitative modeling, risk management, and data-driven investment strategies. I am committed to continuous learning and applying innovative solutions to complex financial challenges.

projects.title: Algorithmic Trading Strategy Backtest
projects.description: Developed and backtested a mean-reversion algorithmic trading strategy using Python and historical market data. The project involved data cleaning, statistical analysis, and performance evaluation.
projects.content: This project focused on creating an automated trading system. I utilized Python's `pandas` and `numpy` libraries for data manipulation, and `matplotlib` for visualization. The strategy was tested against 5 years of historical stock data, demonstrating a Sharpe ratio of 1.2. Key skills: Python, Pandas, NumPy, Algorithmic Trading, Statistical Analysis.

projects.title: Interactive Financial Dashboard
projects.description: Designed and implemented a real-time interactive financial dashboard for portfolio performance tracking and risk visualization using React and D3.js.

projects.title: Credit Risk Assessment Model
projects.description: Built a machine learning model to assess credit risk for loan applications, achieving 92% accuracy. Used scikit-learn for model development and deployed a prototype using Flask.

experiences.title: Quantitative Analyst
experiences.description: Developed and maintained quantitative models for equity derivatives pricing and risk management. Implemented Python-based tools for portfolio optimization and backtesting. Collaborated with traders to integrate models into daily workflows.

experiences.title: Financial Data Scientist
experiences.description: Built machine learning models for fraud detection and customer segmentation. Utilized SQL for data extraction and Python with Pandas for data cleaning and feature engineering. Created interactive dashboards using JavaScript and D3.js.

education.description: Specialized in quantitative finance, stochastic calculus, and derivative pricing. Master's thesis on 'Volatility Modeling using GARCH processes'.
Focused on algorithms, data structures, and software development. Developed several projects using Python and Java.

certifications.name: CFA Level I
certifications.description: Demonstrated foundational knowledge in investment tools, ethical and professional standards, and investment vehicles.

certifications.name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
certifications.description: Validated foundational understanding of AWS Cloud concepts, services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.
